name: Summer Health Education Program (SHEP)
description: SHEP is an eight-week program for high school students held over the summer months from June to August. SHEP members receive comprehensive health outreach training regarding services, public speaking, project planning and implementation, healthy relationships, STI and HIV prevention, nutrition, reproductive health, diversity, and group facilitation. SHEP members represent 3rd Street Youth Center & Clinic by conducting outreach throughout the community, via social media, tabling events, and stree
